## Writable.set() method

Replaces store's state with the provided value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
set(value: U): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | U | value to be used as the new state of a store. |

**Returns:**

void
